Using knitractive with Perl

Jeroen Janssens

2020-03-17

Source: vignettes/examples/perl.Rmd
perl.Rmd

View the corresponding perl.Rmd file.

To exit type 'exit' or '^D'
> sub hello($name = "World") {
*   say "Hello, $name!"
* }
&hello

> hello()
Hello, World!
> hello('You')
Hello, You!
